title: What is the difference between a BTS album, a single, and a mini album? - Quora

response.answer_text: Great question. BTS has released all three at different times over the 7 years. …………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………….. A single is one song released written as a solo by the artist/artists. Winter Bear by V  A mini-album can have up to 5 songs dropped during the year and maybe added into the Tour performance. Mono Playlist by RM  An album can have from 20 - 30 songs, MOTS7 includes the mini-album Persona 5 songs and 15 new songs written by all the artists.   Hope this helps. Ku, Meili Kpop Hit Tv

Mini album contains lesser songs than a album about only 5 to 6 songs. A album contains about 9-10 songs? A single is a song which is in not a album.(e.g.memories by Maroon 5 I think) then repackaged album like MOTS:7 which is new songs with some old ones from their previous albums.
